p:
Abby Nicholson - Lungfishes
Keith Pulles - Polyodon spathula, paddlefish
Chrissy Rohr - Carcharodon carcharias, great white shark
Amanda Roberts - Ictalurus furcatus, blue catfish
Lora Brewer - Scaphirhynchus albus, pallid sturgeon
Andy Bueltman - Micropterus salmoides, largemouth bass
Cody Roberts - Carcharhinus leucas, bull shark
Kristen Javurek - Somniosus microcephalus, Greenland shark
Justin Siebert - Hypothalmichthys molitrix, silver carp
Stephanie Thole - Oncorhynchus mykiss, rainbow trout
Kael Elbert - Betta splendens, Siamese fighting fish
Rachel Nachtweih - Balistoides conspicillum, clown triggerfish
Landon Haggett - Micropterus dolomieu, smallmouth bass
Emily Greife - Atractosteus spathula, alligator gar
Andrew Pinkley - Pylodictus olivaris, flathead catfish
Katie Leonard - Oncorhyncus nerka, sockeye salmon
Jessie Spradling - Dasyatis americana, southern stingray.
Anna Weyers - Amia calva, bowfin
Ben Calvert - Bluefin tuna. "Bluefin tuna" is a complex of three species: Thunna thynnus (Atlantic bluefin tuna), T. orientalis (Pacific bluefin tuna) and T. maccoyi (southern bluefin tuna).
Brett Farris - Ictalurus punctatus, channel catfish
Alicia Bellows - Hypostomus plecostomus, suckermouth catfish
Rachel Rogers - Mola mola, ocean sunfish
Ben Bizzell - Pomoxis nigromaculatus, black crappie
Ryan Huelsmann - one trout or another....
